name: Goblin Tavern
description: A suspiciously friendly goblin-run tavern where not all patrons leave by the front door.

name: Whispering Garden
description: An overgrown moonlit garden where pollen, vines, and a floral hive-mind have turned hostile.

name: Candlewitch Cottage
description: You wake bound to a chair in a too-cozy cottage under the watchful eye of Nana Wick.
